Parameters.Name: pLogOutput
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Write parameters and action summary to server message log (Boolean True = 1)

Parameters.Name: pStrictErrorHandling
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: On encountering any error, exit with major error status by ProcessQuit after writing to the server message log (Boolean True = 1)

Parameters.Name: pHier
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Target Hierarchy (defaults to dimension name if blank)

Parameters.Name: pSrcDir
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Source Directory Path (defaults to Error File Directory)

Parameters.Name: pSrcFile
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Source File Name (defaults to 'Dimension Hierarchy _Export.csv' if blank)

Parameters.Name: pDelim
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: AsciiOutput delimiter character (Default=comma, exactly 3 digits = ASCII code)

Parameters.Name: pQuote
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: AsciiOutput quote character (Accepts empty quote, exactly 3 digits = ASCII code)

Parameters.Name: pLegacy
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: 1 = Legacy format (bedrock v3) 0 or empty = new bedrock v4 format

Parameters.Name: pUnwind
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: 1 = unwind elements 0 = like for like copy which may result in lost elements / data

Parameters.Name: pConsol
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Target Consolidation, accepts wildcards ( * will unwind ALL). Note: ignored if pUnwind=0
